description: Flexo F6's unique split, semi-rigid braided construction make it the ideal solution for situations where ease of installation is of primary importance. description: It's rare to find a mini kit so elegant, it deserves its own Haiku. A simple breakout, 2x3 box header in the center, two 1x3's on the side. Plugs into any breadboard for neat wiring (in both nifty and clean senses of the word). Comes with a quality mini PCB, a 2x3 box header and a small stick of 0.1" header. Requires some light soldering to use: plug the 2x3 in on the top and solder all six pins, then break the header in half and put each half into a breadboard to hold them steady. Place the breakout on top and solder the side pins. Will last you years and years.

title: Monoprice Data Cable - 3 Feet - Red | SATA External Shielded Cable - eSATA to eSATA (Type I to Type I)
description: External SATA (eSATA) cables are designed to connect external SATA devices to either external SATA ports or internal SATA connectors. Unlike cables for internal applications eSATA cabling must be shielded. The eSATA connectors are keyed differently to prevent the use of internal SATA cables in external applications. While internal SATA connectors have an "L" shaped key eSATA connectors use smaller vertically offset keys. This shielded eSATA cable is certified to perform to SATA 6 Gbps performance standards. Each end is terminated in an eSATA connector for use with external SATA devices and controller ports only. Note that SATA 6 Gbps cables are backwards compatible and can be use d with SATA 3 Gbps and SATA 1. 5 Gbps devices.

description: The Adaptec SCSI Card 39160 is tailored for entry to mid-range server environments. It delivers the maximum throughput for Ultra160 SCSI card by using a 64-bit PCI interface. The Adaptec SCSI Card 39160 provides the ideal connection to Ultra160 SCSI (LVD) hard disks and devices (internally and externally) and legacy devices (internally). This 64-bit PCI-to-SCSI adapter performs at up to 160 MB per second and allows for the connection of 30 SCSI devices. Provides two internal 68-pin LVD SCSI connectors, one internal 50-pin Ultra SCSI connector, and two external 68-pin VHDCI LVD SCSI connectors.
